HOME.title: Home
HOME.name: Zach
HOME.description: a software engineer specializing in front-end web development studying Japanese and cybersecurity.

ABOUT.title: About
ABOUT.full_about: My name is Zach Stone, and I am a software engineer with an emphasis on front-end web development. In my spare time, I enjoy studying cybersecurity and the Japanese language. I have both personal and professional experience in creating responsive, high-performing web applications using various front-end frameworks and tools. Additionally, I possess a solid understanding of back-end web development. Apart from my technical skills, I am recognized for my collaborative spirit and unwavering pursuit of excellence. I always try to make a positive impact on both a professional and personal level, working together with those around me to create something great.
ABOUT.title_variation: is a software engineer specializing in front-end web development studying Japanese and cybersecurity.
ABOUT.description2: loves improving processes and believes in the power of habits and routines.
ABOUT.description3: believes that kind and clear communication is the key to success as a team.
ABOUT.description4: is better than he was yesterday, but not as good as he will be tomorrow.

quote1.title: Favorite Quote 1
quote1.text: You can never cross the ocean unless you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.

quote2.title: Favorite Quote 2
quote2.text: Even dust, when piled up, can become a mountain.

interac.name: Assistant Language Teacher
interac.description: As an ALT (Assistant Language Teacher) at Interac, I taught English to Japanese students in public schools.

rapptr.name: Frontend Engineer
rapptr.quote: From app strategy, design and development to launch and ongoing tailored support, we are with you every step of the way â€“ continuously refining and evolving your product.
rapptr.description: Rapptr Labs is a well-established company that has worked with many high-profile clients, including Realtor.com. In addition, they have developed 'Imprint,' Google's Android app of the year for 2023. As a front-end engineer at Rapptr Labs, my primary responsibilities include implementing new features, fixing bugs, and overseeing OPSIQ's weekly deployment. Although I specialize in front-end development, I also have experience with back-end tasks.

fe.description: I have experience using a variety of frontend frameworks and tools to create responsive and accessible web applications. I am also comfortable using CSS and CSS-in-JS tools, such as Styled Components and Tailwind. Crafting strong, reusable components is an art, and I am always looking to improve my skills in this area.
fe.name: Frontend Web

be.description: I have experience using a variety of backend technologies to create REST and GraphQL APIs. I also have experience working with databases in both SQL and NoSQL formats. At Rapptr Labs, I often work on backend tickets for a business-level application using Node.js and Express with a database in SQL, interacted with through Prisma.
be.name: Backend Web

cyber-security.description: My fascination with cybersecurity sparked when I implemented a comprehensive site overhaul according to a third-party audit at work. This experience exposed me to numerous cybersecurity concepts, and since then, I've been avidly seeking to deepen my understanding of this field. I am consistently exploring ways to increase the security of my applications.
cyber-security.name: Cybersecurity

dev-tools.description: Whether it is fixing merge conflicts in Git, or updating tickets in Jira, I am comfortable using a variety of tools to get the job done.
dev-tools.name: Dev Tools

japanese.description: Outside of coding this is my biggest passion. I hope to one day be fluent and spend some time every day studying.
japanese.name: Japanese

AI_FLASHCARDS.name: AI Language Flashcards
AI_FLASHCARDS.description: Utilizing OpenAI technology, this script generates Anki flashcards effortlessly from either a word list or essay. The cards feature hiragana, example sentences, and basic Japanese definitions. Please note that currently, only Japanese cards are supported, but I plan to expand this to other languages in the future!
AI_FLASHCARDS.shortDescription: Generate Anki flashcards from a word list or essay using OpenAI.
